description:

SUPER BIT WORLD : 2D Jump Platformer X - Fly through the air like an 8 bit ninja. The best platforming game on mobile is here. Get ready to challenge yourself like never before and re-live the classic 8-bit era days. Jump, dodge, fly, shoot, and soar. Play the best designed platforming levels this side of ninja gaiden, or blast wave after wave of robots in the shooter level. Unlock weapons, bombs, multipliers, and show off your score to the world. Become a gaming ninja.


TOP POINTS
= Lots of challenging levels; tough and quick.
= Have tonnes of fun blasting enemies in the shooter level.
= NES style art and old school genesis style sound.
= Collect loot to unlock levels and other items
= Mega challenging and fun - nimble fingers required :)
= Free to download

STORY
Bit is a classic console game hero trapped in an 8 bit world. His aim in life is one thing, to get to the goal at the end of the level. Help him dodge, jump, duck, and slide through some of the hardest levels this side of ninja gaiden 2.


HOW TO PLAY
- Your quest is to reach the goal in each level. Don't die kid !!
- Tap left, right and jump with your fingers to run and lep over danger objects.
- Collect loot so you can unlock more levels.
- Use the teleporter button to go to the end of a level if it's too hard.

- In the shooter level, blast the enemies as quick as possible. Live for as long as you can.
- Tap the bomb button if you're in a tight spot, this will wipe out all enemies on the screen.


UPDATE NOTES
